definition: under full sail/going as fast as possible
sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas

sentences.english: Yesterday evening I saw a boat going up the river at full sail , driven by the west wind.
sentences.chinese: 昨天傍晚，我看到一艘滿帆的船，被西風吹送着行駛。

sentences.english: The sails filled out and the boat floated away.
sentences.chinese: 風鼓滿帆後，船漂流而去。

sentences.english: The ship moved ahead full sail.
